name: WP AUDIO GALLERY
author: Husain Bandook Wala

sections.description:
Demo Link :
http://www.husainbandookwala.com/wp-audio-gallery-demo

Free support, just skype me on “husainali72”

WP Audio Gallery is a HTML5 based, simple and responsive audio player plugin which supports custom post type, shortcodes and works on all Browsers & devices. It Doesn’t matter how big your mp3 file is, it will work on this plugin.

Some of its features are :-

  • HTML5 based Audio Player.
  • Responsive Audio Player, compatible to iPhone, Tablets, Laptops etc.
  • Custom Post Type Support.
  • Upload Audio Files from WordPress admin section.
  • Upload Large Audio Files directly via FTP using (Filezilla etc.).
  • Short codes available for inserting Single Audio Player, Audio Gallery Player (With Play list), Gallery lists.
  • Support multiple short codes on single post or page.
  • Compatible with other JavaScript libraries.
  • You can control audio files order in playlist.
  • You can insert artist photo.
  • Enable/Disable download Audio files (Setting Available).
  • Enable/Disable Share Audio on Facebook (Setting Available).
  • Enable/Disable Share Audio on Other Social Services (Setting Available).

Support

If you have any problems, questions or suggestions then you can
Email me on husainali72@gmail.com
Skype me on husainali72
sections.installation:
Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory

Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin Area.

Installation Instructions

Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory

Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin Area.

short_description: An easy to use, modern looking audio player plugin. Works on all modern browsers including iPhone/iPad.
